data:
Thrombotic Occlusion:
Potential thrombotic occlusion catheter clearance is attempted first with alteplase. If unsuccessful after 2 instillations with alteplase within 12 hours, further investigations should be performed to rule out mechanical occlusion
BC Children's Hospital Empiric Antimicrobial Guide
Central Venous Cathether / PICC / Aphersis Catheter
1 mg, catheter, as directed, order duration: 2 doses or times, PRN other (see comment), drug form: inj
1 mg, catheter, as directed, order duration: 2 doses or times, PRN other (see comment), drug form: inj
2 mg, catheter, as directed, order duration: 2 doses or times, PRN other (see comment), drug form: inj
2 mg, catheter, as directed, order duration: 2 doses or times, PRN other (see comment), drug form: inj
